tender.description:
Kingsmead School has a statutory duty to make arrangements for the provision of appropriate education otherwise than at school, for children of compulsory school age who, by reason of exclusion from school or otherwise, will not receive a suitable education without these arrangements. 
Tenders are invited from suitable organisations for the supply of services in respect of Alternative Education Provision for Kingsmead School. 
Lots are as follows:
 Lot 1: Administration, Business and Enterprise
 Lot 2: Animal Care
Lot 3: Arts
 Lot 4: Catering
 Lot 5: Child care
 Lot 6: Construction
 Lot 7: Core Subjects
 Lot 8: Dance
 Lot 9: EAL (English as an Additional Language)
 Lot 10: Engineering
 Lot 11: Fishing
 Lot 12: Hospitality and Catering
 Lot 13: Land Based/ Horticulture Studies
 Lot 14: Motor Vehicle
 Lot 15: Music and Digital Media
 Lot 16: Outdoor Education
 Lot 17: Personal Development and Progression
 Lot 18: Retail and Customer Service
 Lot 19: Sports
 Lot 20: Virtual Learning
 Lot 21: Other
Contracts will be awarded either by direct call-off from the relevant Lot or through further competition. Tenderers may bid for one or more Lots.
The contract will start on 7th September 2015and will continue for one academic year. There is the option to extend for a further two academic years in one year increments, subject to satisfactory performance and mutual agreement.
tender.title: TD0886 - Provision of Alternative Education
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
